mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT T_STAFF.id, T_STAFF.* FROM ( T_STAFF INNER JOIN T_STAFF_SCHEDULE_PLAN ON T_STAFF_SCHEDULE_PLAN.staff_id = T_STAFF.id AND T_STAFF_SCHEDULE_PLAN.work_date = #{date} ) INNER JOIN ( SELECT MIN(T_AREAWORK.end_date) AS min_date, T_AREAWORK.carer_id AS carer_id FROM T_AREAWORK WHERE CONVERT(nvarchar(23), T_AREAWORK.end_date, 120) > #{date} AND T_AREAWORK.area_ids LIKE '%,' + CAST(#{id} AS VARCHAR(1000)) + ',%' GROUP BY T_AREAWORK.carer_id ) AS T1 ON T_STAFF.id = T1.carer_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_AREAWORK(carer_id, area_ids, gero_id, end_date, status) VALUES (#{carerId}, #{areaIds}, #{geroId}, #{endDate}, #{status})
